column2: Novice Agent

An Agent is an individual who has had an education dedicated to the arts of subterfuge, deception and deceit. While they may be viewed negatively as underhanded rogues, many Nobles are trained in the arts of Subterfuge by their parents and tutors in the hopes they can put those skills to use overcoming rivals and opponents without the necessity for bloodshed on a large scale.

Novice Diplomat

A Diplomat is an individual who has undergone an extensive education dedicated to the arts of diplomacy and philosophy of the mind. When it comes to negotiating contracts or handling foreign relations there are few better than these individuals.
Journeyman Diplomat

Novice Mage

A Mage is an individual that has had a dedicated education in the arcane arts. Wielding Magicka is their passion and Mages are some of the most powerful individuals in the land thanks to their talents.

Novice Magistrate

A Magistrate is an individual who has been educated in how to best handle the day to day business of a House, Guild or even a Kingdom. They are astute when it comes to administering realms and their finances as well as the intricacies of the laws of the land making them great Stewards.
Journeyman Magistrate

Novice Warrior

A Warrior is an individual who has had a dedicated education in warfare, personal combat and other martially inclined pursuits. They are unparalled on the battlefield with sword, spear or any of a variety of weapons and can command roves of battle-ready troops in maneuvres and formations.
Journeyman Warrior

When I play, I do best when I trust my instincts. It's okay to think, just not to think too much. That slows me down.
I will seize the day!
Young [From.GetFirstName] does not care in the least about the consequences of [From.GetHerHis] actions.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] tells me that there are consequences to everything that I do, and I need to think about this seriously.
Ha, as if!
I've learned that when I want to get something done, I need to do it myself. And trying to play nice is the surest way to fail. Now I know the ends justify the means.
Stay out of my way.
I've noticed that young [From.GetFirstName] is so cold and severe.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should learn to temper my self-centered attitude.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a naive fool!
What they never tell you about those questing heroes who wander the world is that they're always covered in dirt, and blood, and ew! - who knows what else. They're just filthy!
Whereas I shall strive to look my best!
Young [From.GetFirstName] surrounds [From.GetHerHim]self with finery and is overly-obsessed with [From.GetHerHis] image.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I spend far too much time preening and not enough time interacting with others.
Doing anything else takes time away from looking my best!
So much to do, and so little time! Sometimes I get overwhelmed and lose track of what I need to be doing.
Wait...I just lost my train of thought!
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to have a hard time keeping track of everything that [From.GetSheHe] needs to do.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says that a righteous cause to concentrate on would help me stay focused.
No, I can handle this. Really!
I love learning about magic. There are other things I'm supposed to do - chores, playtime, bathing - but I don't have time for any of that!
Leave me to my studies!
Young [From.GetFirstName] loves to study magic but doesn't appear to care about anything else - not even personal hygiene! It shows a clear lack of respect for others as well as [From.GetHerHim]self.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I'm turning into a mess, and that it suggests a weakness of personal character and courtesy for others. [From.GetFirstName] wants me to clean up my act - literally.
Don't turn your nose up at me!
No one is better than I am. And certainly no one is more [Root.GetBeautifulHandsome] than I am!
I always look my best - and my best is THE best.

[From.GetFirstName] won't stop self-aggrandizing about [From.GetHerHis] looks. Whether it's at court, during studies, or even playing with the other children, [From.GetFirstName] seems obsessed with telling everyone how [From.GetBeautifulHandsome] [From.GetSheHe] thinks [From.GetSheHe] is.
[From.GetFirstName] tells me that I should stop being so arrogant about my appearance and focus my energy into accomplishing other things instead.
[From.GetFirstName] is just trying to undermine me.
Wherever I go, I feel so isolated. So...unnoticed. Maybe if I looked nicer, people would notice me?
It's time to make a fashion statement!

I overheard young [From.GetFirstName] talking to [From.GetHerHim]self about how if [From.GetSheHe] was better-groomed and more fashionable, [From.GetSheHe] would be better-respected by the other children.
[From.GetFirstName] says that I should stop trying to impress the other children to make them like me, and be more comfortable with who I am.
Doesn't [From.GetFirstName] understand? This is who I am!
Rules are stupid. Why should I comb my hair? Why do I have to wash up before eating? Why does my room need to be clean? It's a waste of time!
Nobody tells me what to do!
[From.GetFirstName] has started going out of [From.GetHerHis] way to disobey the proper rules about cleanliness and keeping a tidy living space.
[From.GetFirstName] told me that I should be more proud of who I am and take my hygiene more seriously.
No thanks.
I love playing with the other children! Climbing trees, sparring, catching bugs, eating dirt, playing tag in the sewers...
I don't think I could ever get tired of this!
Young [From.GetFirstName] has a complete disreregard for [From.GetHerHis] cleanliness and even [From.GetHerHis] safety.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my carefree attitude and tried to beat it out of me.
I've gotten more bruises from playing tag!
Studying matters of faith, great men and women, mysteries of the arcane...I'm so busy studying. I don't have time for hygiene, or playing, or even eating!
Can't they see that I'm very busy!?
Little [From.GetFirstName] is putting so much energy into [From.GetHerHis] studies that [From.GetSheHe] is becoming increasingly gruff, distanced, and weird...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that I should spend less time studying, and be more courteous and empathetic.
No! Leave me alone!
